title: Block
definition: A part of a **tower** an forms a space on the board. When you **build**, place **blocks** from largest to smallest so that they stack.

title: Build
definition:
A **block** or dome on an unoccupied space **neighboring** the **moved Worker**.
​ 
​You can **build** onto a **level** of any height, but you __**must**__ choose the correct shape of **block** or **dome** for the **level** being built. A tower with 3 blocks and a **dome** is considered a “**Complete Tower**”.

title: Complete Tower
definition: Consists of exactly three **blocks** and a **dome**.

title: Dome
definition:
The top level ona  **Tower**. **Domes** cannot have anything placed upon them. a **dome** may only be **built** on top of the third level, unless otherwise specified by a **God** or **Hero Power**.
​ 
​**Domes are not blocks**
​If the **God Power** description states it affects **blocks**, it does not affect **domes**.

title: Force
definition:
**“Forced” is not “moved”.**
​ 
​Some **God Powers** may cause **Workers** to be “**forced**” into another space. A **Worker** that is **forced**, is not considered to have **moved**.
​ 
​__**Remember:**__ to win the game by moving onto the third level, your **Worker** must **move up** during __your__ turn. Therefore, if your **Worker** is **Forced** onto the third level, you do not win the game. **Moving** from one third level space to another also does not trigger a win. 
​

title: Move
definition:
Move your selected **Worker** into one of the (up to) eight **neighboring** spaces.
​ 
​A **Worker** may **move up** a maximum of one level higher, **move down** any number of levels lower, or **move** along the samelevel. A **Worker** may not **move up** more than one level.

title: Neighboring
definition: Each space has up to eight spaces surrounding it. These are called **neighboring** spaces.

title: Perimeter Space
definition: One of the 16 spaces along the edge of the board

title: Token
definition: A marker specific to a **God** or **Hero Power**. You cannot place a **Token** ontoa space that is occupied or contains another **Token**. Remove **Tokens** from the board when **blocks** are placed upon them.

title: Unmoved Worker
definition: A ** Worker** that did not move on your turn.

title: Unoccupied Space
definition: A space not containing a **Worker** or **dome**.

title: Win
definition:
If one of your **Workers moves up** on top of **level 3** during your turn, you instantly win! 
​ 
​ You __must__ always perform a **move** then **build** on your turn. If you are unable to, you lose.
